### Monitoring energy use can be hard.Wattvision makes it easy.
#  Track live energy use at your home, business, rental property, or other site.
#  Understand your use, take steps to conserve, and even produce bills for tenants.
#  Compare, share, and download your data at wattvision.com or, as a developer, use our open API.
### How To Start
### Setup Sensors
Whether sensors from Rainforest Automation, EKM Metering, or Wattvision's own sensors -- we can track energy use from almost any utility meter or set of wires!
[Learn More](http://www.wattvision.com/</sensors>)
### Connect to Wattvision
In just one step, your sensors can be connected and uploading data to the Wattvision Cloud, where it is stored for visualization, alerting, and analysis.
### Experience your Data!
View your live energy use data at all of your properties/sites, download data, integrate with our developer API, and understand your energy use all on web or mobile.
### What We Offer
###  Live View
View your current energy use and consumption rate updated every 10 seconds.
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/live_view.jpg>)
###  Bill View 
Create your own energy bills for personal use or to send to tenants, and set up custom pricing periods (paid plans only). 
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/bill_view.jpg>)
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/weekly_history.jpg>)
###  Weekly History 
View your energy usage in a heat-map format to easily see your most and least efficient days.
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/monthly_history.jpg>)
###  Monthly History 
View your energy consumption totals from each day in the month as a large-scale overview of energy use (paid plans only).
###  Daily View 
Compare your energy use from today with other days in Kilowatt-hours. 
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/daily_history_1.jpg>)
###  Daily View 
Compare your energy use from today with other days in Watts. 
[ ](http://www.wattvision.com/<zimg/front_images/daily_history_2.jpg>)

generated_description:
Wattvision is a Princeton, NJ-based company that's been making waves since its founding in 2009 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W09. With its mission to provide "sensors and software for energy tracking," Wattvision is like the Fitbit for energy use; it helps users monitor their consumption in real-time and gain insights into their energy habits.

Initially, Wattvision focused on selling a complete sensor and software solution. Now, the company is honing in on developing software that works seamlessly with its hardware partners. They aim to simplify energy monitoring, making it a straightforward process for everyone, whether it's for homes, businesses, or rental properties.

The Wattvision platform provides a comprehensive view of your energy use. Users can track their live consumption, receive alerts, and even create bills for tenants. It supports various sensors, from their own to those from partners like Rainforest Automation and EKM Metering, allowing for broad accessibility across different utility meters.

### Key Features:
- **Live Tracking:** Get updates every 10 seconds on your current energy consumption.
- **Historical Data:** View your energy usage over days and weeks to identify trends and inefficiencies.
- **Bill Generation:** Users can create and customize bills based on their data, streamlining communications with tenants.
- **Developer-Friendly:** Wattvision offers an open API, enabling developers to integrate and share energy data effectively.

Customer reviews highlight the product's effectiveness, with many saying it quickly pays for itself by cutting energy costs or helping users make smarter consumption choices.

If you're looking to optimize energy use and promote sustainability, Wattvision offers a range of plans from free to unlimited, making it accessible for everyone. Interested users can visit their website at [wattvision.com](http://www.wattvision.com) to sign up and start tracking their energy today.
